Description: Name of file, including library reference, that lists patients to be excluded from snapshot-specific output files
A descriptive identifier for the Data Partner organization.

Notes.1: This should be a 3-6 UPPERCASE character abbreviation.

Description: Location of this request package's root directory.
Specify the file path to the location of this ETL's Phase A Sentinel Common Data Model (SCDM) datasets.
The overall SCDM minimum date.

Notes.1: Value can be found in QA Package output.

Description: The overall SCDM maximum date.

Notes.1: Value can be found in QA Package output.

Description: ETL number for the current Phase A production ETL.
Parameter indicating the version of the Sentinel Common Data Model associated with this ETL.
Specifies the enrollment table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the demographic table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the dispensing table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the encounter table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the diagnosis table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the procedure table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the facility table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the provider table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name. Default values are provided.
Specifies the Lab Results table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the death table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the cause of death table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the vital signs table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the inpatient pharmacy table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the inpatient transfusion table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the prescribing table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the patient reported measures survey table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the patient reported measures response table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat file name.
Specifies the feature engineering table name. Value should exclude the .sas7bdat extension part of the file name.
